title: Photo of Great Zimbabwe - evaluate visual source

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe one factor that contributed to the prosperity of a society in East or Southern Africa from 100 BCE to 1500 CE.Describe one function of the stone architecture in the source. Explain one way the architecture in the source challenges misconceptions about early Africa.

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe one factor that contributed to the prosperity of a society in East or Southern Africa from 100 BCE to 1500 CE.Describe one function of the stone architecture in the source. Explain one way the architecture in the source challenges misconceptions about early Africa.

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
